# ReplaceTextOptions.Default property

Gets a default replace text options, includes Comparison as OrdinalIgnoreCase value and strategies position values as Default.

```csharp
public static ReplaceTextOptions Default { get; }
```

## Property Value

A [`ReplaceTextOptions`](../ReplaceTextOptions.md) instance that contains the default value of replace text options.
